high_descs: Turn around and go forward and then to the right to stand in front of the dresser.
Pick the book up from the dresser.
Turn around and go forward and then left to stand in front of the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a book and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Turn around completely and walk forward. Then turn to the right and go to the dresser.
Pick up the textbook from the dresser.
Turn around then walk forward. Make a left and walk to the desk.
Use the textbook to turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: With a textbook turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the end of the bed, then turn right and go to the dresser under the window, across the room.
Pick up the book to the left of the pencil on the dresser.
Turn around and go past the bed, then turn left and go to the desk to the right of the bed.
Turn on the lamp in the back, left corner of the desk.
